original_text: Jesus then said, ‘Think carefully about the things that you hear. God will give to you in the same way that you give to other people. And you will receive even more.
korean_text: 또 이르시되 너희가 무엇을 듣는가 스스로 삼가라 너희의 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희가 헤아림을 받을 것이며 더 받으리니

sentences.original_text: Think carefully about the things that you hear.
in the same way that you give to other people.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 다른 사람들에게 주는 것과 같은 방식으로.

sentences.original_text: And you will receive even more.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너는 더 많은 것을 받을 것이다.
